Instruction: Allow rice to soak in water for one hour before draining.
Transfer the rice and walnuts into a blender, adding 1 1/4 cup of milk, and blend until the consistency is smooth.
Move the blended walnut mixture to a saucepan and set it to medium heat until boiling.
Gradually incorporate the remaining 3 cups of milk into the mixture, adding additional milk if required, to maintain a balanced consistency.
Lastly, blend in the sweetened condensed milk.
